name: The Ultimate Leftovers Strangewich
author: Hellmann's
summary: Got Thanksgiving leftovers? Turn them into a delicious grilled sandwich with fontina cheese, cranberry sauce, kale, and roasted turkey.
ingredients: 4 ounces sliced fontina cheese or brie cheese
¼ cup whole berry cranberry sauce
2 tablespoons Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise
directions: Evenly top 2 bread slices with cheese, cranberry sauce , kale, then turkey
Spread outside of sandwiches evenly with Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise
Cook sandwiches in large nonstick skillet over medium heat, turning once, until golden brown and cheese is melted, about 5 minutes
